name: node-cal
description: A JS implementation of UNIX 'cal' program to run in NodeJS.

scripts.coverall: node --harmony_destructuring ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover && --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/.bin/coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Caleb Scholze <jcsdevel@gmail.com>
